amendment.description: Amendment sought to require State and regional transportation plans to include project descriptions and to score projects based on criteria developed by the State or the region, not the Federal Government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 54 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to direct states and metropolitan planning organizations to develop publicly available criteria to prioritize transportation projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 252 (Roll no. 599).

action.text: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
